resources:
CountMeIn Welcome! Running Count formula: True Count formula: Running Count / Remaining decks4 Running count = 10 & 5 decks remaining = the true count is 2 Players Decks Play This app focuses on the Hi-Lo strategy of counting cards. There are several different methods to card counting, but this method is the easiest to start learning. Counting cards increases your chances of winning by 1 to 2 percent, and is a fun brain exercise! Happy counting! Hearts Spades Clubs Diamonds Running count True count Show totals Show running count: Show true count: Next hand Submit DONE Running total: %1$s \n True count: %2$s
Your guesses: hold first_card_image second_card_image Swipe cards for next hand

7–9 = 0
10-A = -1
